website_summaries.verdict: Eliminate the need for a sharpener with this self-sharpening eyeliner.
pros: Pack of 1 or 2, comes in black, earl grey, and deepest ocean
Eyeliner glides on smoothly and is self-sharpening
Fine tip end makes perfect cat eyes or use the smudging end to create a smokey look
Stays in place all day without setting spray
cons: Eyeliner doesn't hold up well on oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you're getting a new product and not used or a previous return
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Product line is great Dislikes: there is no protective seal. Item came unwrapped. I'm not going to use a product that I know isn't supposed to come the way it did. Just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Black residue around eyes
customer_reviews.text: The application is easy because it twists up, and glides on well. But it leaves a lot of black residue around my eyes as the day goes on. I find myself constantly wiping under my eyes to get rid of the darkness left by this eyeliner. (I only apply on the top lashes). I've had better luck with low-cost eyeliners like wet and wild.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am a make up artist and always trying new things. This deserves a one star. The tip continuously broke off. I probably only used it five times before all the product had broken off. Plus this photo is a little deceiving. You are only purchasing one pencil yet two are pictured.
customer_reviews.author: carmen c.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible, Magical, Affordable, Waterproof Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this same eyeliner for over eight years now. It is the only pencil eyeliner with smudger combo that I have ever had that wears like a true waterproof eyeliner. I have an eye that does not have a tear duct system so it constantly waters, and this is the only eyeliner that I have ever had that lasts throughout the day!!!
customer_reviews.author: jwar

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE ONE TO BEAT!
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using another brand for about 2 years and it came up on my Amazon as a suggestion. Read the comments and thought what the heck, I'll try. Amazing! I put it on early in the morning, attended a brunch, then a wedding, then the reception and checked it throughout the day and it was just as if had just applied. Excellent product! and great price. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Museical27

customer_reviews.title: Dark grey with tiny sparkles - flattering
customer_reviews.text: I love Rimmel Exaggerate eyeliners. I apply in the morning, put some shadow or powder on over to set it and it's good all day long. This particular color (Earl Grey) was darker than I'd been expecting/hoping for, but when I put it on I just loved it. It's a good dark grey and has very tiny, eye flattering sparkles in it. The sparkles were an unexpected bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Sephora eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Like it, and cheaper than Sephora. This is cheaper than the comparable product from Sephora (brand) and is basically the same thing. Actually...less greasy even. I have hooded eyes and it doesn't transfer from my lid to my crease "overhang" is a crease "overhang" the anatomical term? Well it is now.
customer_reviews.author: Alena H.

customer_reviews.title: I like the way this eyeliner goes on smoothly and lasts well
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner is easy to apply not greasy at all and it stays on pretty well (putting a little loose powder around your eyes helps).
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time, keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with these. Swore I purchase a two pack, then it changed to a one pack by the time it made it to me. Dries out so easily. Even after keeping it capped it became hard to apply within a week or two. Doesn’t blend well, blending tool is also not the best shape/applicator. Definitely not waterproof, either. Unless you count that as putting it on your water line, I can’t get it to apply there (only apply liner to my upper lash line in my day to day anyway) without heating it up the old fashioned way. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s all what I needed for my naturally Arabian eyes.
customer_reviews.author: BasselAreej

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner was NOT sealed AT ALL and came in a zip lock bag. The tip of the eyeliner looked used. Unsanitary and absolutely disgusting. Never buy makeup that isn't hermetically sealed!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great for an edgy look
customer_reviews.text: I would not use this if you want precise lines. This is great for a more feathered rougher edgy look. I use it mostly on my waterline and it sticks really good (and is usually the last product to get removed). Definitely waterproof. The product is a bit waxy and spreads easily, but also meas is can smudge which is why I say it's not great for precision. The built in smudger is great. I have had no problems with the product breaking, but you should only extend the little bit you need. It goes on very dark which I love. If I could only keep one eye product I think this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted waterproof eyeliner that didn't come off (simple, right?), but this product disappointed me. It came off within 20 minutes of wearing it. It even left line marks under my eyes from having it on my top lash line. I can easily wipe it off or smear it, which is not good. I've used CoverGirl InkIt in the past and it works much better than this Rimmel eyeliner. In fact, I'm ordering it now to replace this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Bone dry, dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bone dry. Tossed it after a light try on the wrist and it fell to pieces. Not even worth the effort to return. Should be ashamed selling this!
customer_reviews.author: frugalfanny

customer_reviews.title: I like this pencil...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pencil. It goes on smoothly. I found I am able to blend it when I want to have a smudged look. If I use it on the water line it doesn't last quite as long. I no longer need a liner to last 14 hrs since I've retired. It doesn't wear off splotchy in any case. Removing it from the outer lashline is easier than some but still wants to linger. I use oil based remover to gently melt it away.
customer_reviews.author: ddfort

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: Its very gentle and easy to apply on my small lids and its not too dark, just right for me. I've never used eyeliner before. I learned it from a make up artist on line who recommnded this. The only thing I see is that you have to be careful and wind it back down or it gets smushed easy. I don't think it will last that long. Would I order it again? Most definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Vickies Place

customer_reviews.title: Great for  for tightlining
customer_reviews.text: I have sparse lashes. Use this to tightline my lashes and it really works. It does smudge after a few hours though. Still love it because it goes on nice and thick so no need for repeat strokes. Too thick to use for making a nice winged eye look, maybe cat eye if you are super skilled.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R.

customer_reviews.title: It came out of package and used. The tip was broken off and obviously opened.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black and the brown. The brown came in a sealed package and the black did not. The black was obviously opened and used since the tip was broken. When I twisted it up not much product. I opened the brown and it was normal and good. Seriously, sending the black was extremely poor ethics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting!!! UNpackaged,UNsealed,UNsanitary,UNacceptable & INELIGIBLE for returns :/
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting!!! Product arrived UNpackaged,UNsealed,UNsanitary,UNacceptable & INELIGIBLE for returns :/ **insert eye roll** :-l
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner was broken in multiple places and I was only able to use it three or four times bc it kept breaking and falling apart and yes I know how to apply eyeliner bc I’ve been using this exact brand of eyeliner for years. I will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: shantilly

customer_reviews.title: I love the little spongy nub at the end
customer_reviews.text: I love the little spongy nub at the end. Dampening it with plain water makes it a great little eraser for mistakes when applying this eyeliner. The liner itself is soft and waxy, and very hard to sharpen without losing a lot of product. It breaks frequently when I use it, even when it's only been rolled up a few millimeters. That's really my only grievance. The liner is smudged slightly by the end of the day, but it's summer and I have oily skin, so it's not like I'm expecting miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Samira Daukoru

customer_reviews.title: Vivid color, smooth application, lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very dark eyeliner that goes on smooth and stays all day. It is nearly impossible to remove all of it at the end of the day, but that’s kind of a selling point. I mean, if it’s easy to remove, it won’t last all day, right? Anyway, the self-sharpening feature is great. It helps me to make precise, sharp lines. The other end is great for smudging the line to fill in thicker areas and works beautifully! It works like much more expensive products! Love this eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying all the waterproof smudge proof Eyeliner and I can't find one that actually works.🤦‍♀️ not even a few hrs go bye and I have black liner under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Colette Cather-Moss

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner, I have been using it for years. It has consistently been harder to find in the stores so the subscribe and save option is great I never run out. It goes on smooth every time, the pigment is great, and stays until you want it to come off. I have even worn it in the pool and it still stays even if you rub your eyes. It does come off well when you use a facial cleanser though. All around it is a great product highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Fitnessqueen

customer_reviews.title: Not a good one
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to remove. Not waterproof so it goes everywhere after half day. Very easy to apply though and looks good. Overall cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: hhvv

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Liner
customer_reviews.text: I love blue and purple eye liner but the last one I bought had to be sharpened with a sharpener. It would constantly break off and was really more work than I wanted. I had always liked this type of liner but never purchased a Rimmel product before. The price was good so I took a chance. It goes on easily and although not as blue as I would have liked, I am glad I tried it. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: K LTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Goes on & stays on!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on great. Some others are really hard to apply & for an old bird that's too hard on thin skin. This one goes on & stays put, like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Lininwa

customer_reviews.title: don't leave in the car
customer_reviews.text: This eye liner worked great and lasted all day. I only used this item a few times then left my purse in the car on a hot day, and it melted. It wouldn't twist up any more after that, so I only used it a few times. I would probably buy it again and be more mindful about it melting.
customer_reviews.author: Hedda B

customer_reviews.title: Different quality than past purchases
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product before & loved it, worked great, lasted all day w/ no smudging. But then I bought this 2 pack and it sucks, smudges more than non waterproof eyeliner. Not sure if they changed the formula or if they're just hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Really is waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking forever for an eye pencil that doesn't end up below my eye. This is it. Put it on in the morning and before bed it is still there exactly as I applied it. I even have to use Vaseline to remove, which takes it off great. It is also the most inexpensive pencil out there. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adamsjaz

customer_reviews.title: Better than Mac pencil!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't do reviews, bc I'm so busy. But, honey this pencil is the bomb! I normally buy my pencils from Mac, that costs 20.00 per pencil, never again. This pencil is actually better, it glides on so smooth. I ordered three my first purchase and ordered three more this week. I will never buy a Mac pencil again, as long as amazon continues with this one. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Payton

customer_reviews.title: I works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner!.I have dry eyes so my eyes are always tearing and this eyeliner stayed on:)
customer_reviews.author: Zasarret

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!! Water resistant eye liner
customer_reviews.text: I have tried LOTS of the more expensive eye liners that claim not to budge for my waterline since I am a contact lens wearer and most things I try have tried did not live up to hype and end up smudging my contacts with the least little bit of tear action or wear away and disappear. I have purchased this particular eyeliner 6 times now and truthfully it has out performed all the more expensive high end ones I have tried! ....and let's talk about the price--AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger J

customer_reviews.title: love this liner
customer_reviews.text: I use this eyeliner on my water line I never have problems with it running or rubbing off I use makeup remover to remove or face cream and I love how dark the black is, I used to use a named brand liner for 17 dollars and since I tried this brand OMG the payoff and price are amazing I'm loyal to this liner now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darlas' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it stays on all day!I do not have to reapply or touch up at all ❤
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Tasha 1977

customer_reviews.title: Product did not come with the safety seal, as it should
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product often from local stores and love it. The liners that were sent to me did NOT come with the safety seal like they're supposed to. UNACCEPTABLE! Who wants to use some random unsealed product??!
customer_reviews.author: nm

customer_reviews.title: Packaging?
customer_reviews.text: Seems to me there should’ve been some original packaging of this eyeliner. Like plastic around it or some kind of company packaging. Instead it looked as if it had been opened. Won’t be using.
customer_reviews.author: jeanius

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. It goes on well and it lasts. The price is wonderful-it's nice to not spend a lot of money on a product that works so well. I was hesitant to buy it because the price was cheap but I thought what the heck I will give it a try. So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good color and stays on well
customer_reviews.text: Good eyeliner. You will definitely need wipes or some sort of specialized cleansing agent (soap) to get this off so keep that in mind when purchasing. Regular soap will not suffice unless you're okay spending at least 10 minutes scrubbing your eyeballs out. Great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay on. Had to keep re-applying this throughout the day. I finally gave up & was very surprised how easily this came off with just a paper towel especially since this is described as being waterproof. It is not waterproof at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years . I love it because it’s easy to apply and stays on for 18 hours. It doesn’t smear either. I constantly reorder this through amazon. They have the best prices.
customer_reviews.author: Jerzeegirlrocks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to apply to my waterline, but that's the ONLY downfall. I just use Rimmel's black gel liner for that. Goes on smoothly otherwise; rich black color. If you're going to smudge it, you best work fast: this stuff doesn't budge! No reason to spend a lot on expensive liners, this one is GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hey-it’s eyeliner. What do you expect?
customer_reviews.text: Nice black color. It goes on easy and it stays mostly well put. It does tend to run if you plan to wear it longer than 8-10 hours, but that’s what the eraser is for ;).
customer_reviews.author: Richardsdaughter

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty pleased. Applies well, has average staying power, gone by the end of the day but haven't found any that is both easy to apply and stays all day so it's as good as any other.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Will never purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner was the worst I've ever owned. The entire time I used it I had to brush it against a piece of toilet paper first in order for bits of it to break off then brush it again in order for color to appear, I did that the entire time, such a disappointment and a total waste of money. I should have thrown it out after the first use but I figured I'd deal with it until I bought a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kohl pencil for my mother, and my mom used it many times, but it is easy to break when used and its quality is not as good as what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Aisel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but dry
customer_reviews.text: This a nice liner,, but a little dry, probably because it’s water proof. Still smears under the eye. Update- this liner became so dry that it was breaking off and wouldn’t line at all. I ended up throwing away!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: If all over your face is what you’re looking for this is the eyeliner for you
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to remove because it ends up all over your face. It runs horribly. I’ll never buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I have allergies and my eyes water. This product does not get removed with my eyes watering. I have contacts. I can you soap, water & a towel to remove this from under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner, but beware! Although this is a two pack, they're much smaller than the regular sized ones that you get at Target or other stores!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Towers

customer_reviews.title: I really like this color of blue
customer_reviews.text: I really like this color of blue. I have blue eyes and after reading several articles that blue eyed women CAN wear blue, I decided to try this eyeliner. It glides on very easily; no tugging. After a minute or so it does warm up on my lids and I touch up places that need a little more product. Because I have oily eyelids even though I use an eye primer I sometimes touch up the eyeliner if I'm going out in the evening. I've ordered this twice so I must like it!
customer_reviews.author: Country Gal

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye line because it is a swivel tip. No need to sharpen. I will only use this liner and not spend time of money trying to sharpen a pencil that will never be the same after the point breaks or dulls.
customer_reviews.author: dora sanders

customer_reviews.title: This item comes in different colors
customer_reviews.text: This item works great for out lining your eyes. Very soft, especially if you use this on the inner eye lid. No scratching or burning.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Came in melted and the product won't come out. (I received a damaged one)
customer_reviews.author: Avhie

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: This liner smudges and then its waterproof, so good luck correcting any mistakes without having to completly removing your eyemake up.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. It’s affordable, waterproof and stays put on my waterline all day.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty. you can make a lighter blue if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a dark Blue color , Very pretty . you can make a lighter blue if you use the little tip to smooth it out :)
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: No smudge, stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Rimmel eye liner is a favorite It goes on easily and stays on with no raccoon eyes resulting. It is priced reasonably and arrived fresh and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this seller!
customer_reviews.text: The price on this eyeliner was fantastic. I love Rimmel but have had issues locating it at my local department store.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie W

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Find
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it works great for me. It does rub off easily so be careful about rubbing your eye area, I can't find this product at Walmart or Ulta but it was on Amazon, my go to place.
customer_reviews.author: DoreenS

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Crayon too soft, hard to apply cleanly (and yes, it’s stored in a cool place). And tip breaks. Will throw it away to avoid the bother.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeFan

customer_reviews.title: crumbles when applying
customer_reviews.text: this is horrible....it crumbles when trying to apply it, no matter how gentle I am with it..although once I do get it on, it does last all day..I would definitely NOT recommend this and NEVER buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Gerald F. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: I'm still shopping around
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't impressed by the afternoon I had raccoon eyes and I only wear liner and eye shadow. So to find something long lasting is my mission. Still looking
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eyeliner while traveling and absolutely loved it. I have naturally watery eyes and therefore LOVE the waterproof eyeliner, especially when going out with my sweetie pie where I know I'll be laughing my head off...making my eyeliner run...leaving not-so-fun black smudges under my eyes. I searched far and wide at all my local stores, couldn't find my typical black anywhere (only blue or brown). I finally reverted to my old ways of ordering online while stationed overseas, and BAM! I found it :) Sooo happy over this find!! Stocking up this time!
customer_reviews.author: MadHaus

customer_reviews.title: Not smudge proof
customer_reviews.text: Bot smudge proof, not sweat or water proof. I still have to wipe my eyes throughout the day to avoid looking like raccoon.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Czebieniak

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't run much
customer_reviews.text: I am always searching for an eyeliner that doesn't end up running under my eye by the end of the day. This one runs a little but I love the pigment of it and it definitely hold better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smudges easily, but great price
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to eyeliner but I find that it smudges very easily during the day and comes off even easier. I usually need to reapply twice a day if I'm being lazy. Great price for eyeliner though.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Here

customer_reviews.title: It may be waterproof but smears all day!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy but doesn't stay in place. I had eyeliner smeared in places I didn't want. I looked loke a raccoon! I've never felt so self-conscious about my eyeliner until using this brand. I don't plan on using again.
customer_reviews.author: AaG

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant or waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not water resistant or water proof in any manner! It gets in my eyes and stings!
customer_reviews.author: zempman

customer_reviews.title: love the look!!
customer_reviews.text: Hello! Rimmel's eyeliner doesn't smudge, goes on easy and easily wipes off. I love the London look too and look forward to buying more Rimmel products! Thanks! Cleo P.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Cleo P. Capers

customer_reviews.title: Must be ridiculously gentle or it breaks
customer_reviews.text: The product itself wasn’t bad but regardless of how long I had the crayon extended it immediately broke off. I wasted 3/4 of this liner in breaks alone. Like it was old or something.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have bery oily skin so hardly anything actually lasts but this did a fairly good job other then the imprint transferred to my upper part of eyelid. I mostly convinced myself it just looked like eyeshadow so was overall cool with it.
customer_reviews.author: MoB

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeliner!!!!  My favorite!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eye liner!!! I have tried a lot but this one is really good!! Always looks fresh!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply and stays put.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good eyeliner. It's very easy to apply and it doesn't run down my face.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: great buy for price
customer_reviews.text: exactly as I expected, nice and black and smooth and creamy goes on beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Better than the loreal one I was using before. Actually stays on waterline all day. Love it. This is now my favorite eyeliner and from no one I will only buy this brand
customer_reviews.author: terra jager

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my go-to liners. I'm not super fancy with my makeup, I use foundations, blush, eyeliner and some mascara. This is the one I go to all the time. It glides on smooth and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Tellier

customer_reviews.title: Disastrous on me
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smeared all over my eyes after a couple hours of wear, and gradually faded to blue/green. Wow, craziest worst eyeliner I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: BettyLiberty

customer_reviews.title: not much liner
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally pulled the end off the pencil....eyeliner actual 1/4-1/2" long...not much product
customer_reviews.author: susan machado

customer_reviews.title: it's a perfect waterproof eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I really love this eyeliner. It glide easy. It's not smudge at all.
customer_reviews.author: octoria a musman

customer_reviews.title: I want a continues line with out breaking the tip that lasts all day.
customer_reviews.text: The tip breaks and I can’t get a sharp crisp continues line. I can not recommend .
customer_reviews.author: PTC Lady

customer_reviews.title: Really a good mascara pencil!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this from the first time I used it! One of the best on the market and great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's eyeliner. It seems to be oil based. So it goes on super easy. It does smudge. But that's okay
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hood

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner for your money
customer_reviews.text: Rommel is just as good if not better than high priced eyeliners. Works well. Stays on til you wash it off and it doesn’t smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Great color, easy to apply, and lasts all day without smearing
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gray

customer_reviews.title: I finally found it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking and looking for several years. I finally found one I like that's waterproof. Built in sharpener! And you don't have to fight with it to get it on! I really like this one! Finally!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s supposed too. The pigment is good. The only reason I give it a three star rating is because mine broke right away with little to no pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: Not smudge proof
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I think. Just a little sweat and I end up like a panda.
customer_reviews.author: Elvira Oquendo Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner on the Market!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! I love this eyeliner so much Finally something that stays on m inner eye
customer_reviews.author: Alex 💜

customer_reviews.title: Great liner. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice liner for the price. Goes on smooth and has a smudger end. Comes in handy. Def will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It works well for me it doesn’t smudge throughout my whole workday .
customer_reviews.author: tina ganemian

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner for a very reasonable price. Goes on smoothly and stays on well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C-T---

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for waterproof and long lasting. This only stays on for about 1-2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda L Brown

customer_reviews.title: The only one I've tried that works.
customer_reviews.text: It is quite waterproof unlike others I've tried. It won't smear all over the place but it still can be removed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A FAVORITE OF MINE FOR YEARS
customer_reviews.text: Have used this brand for years....it is easy to apply and unless I get sweaty, it stays on all day..... the blue is a nice smoky color and not too vivid...it has a rubber tip for smudging the lines if you prefer that look.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you'd get in the store for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie McClain

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, new condition. Very happy to find it for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew&Bekkah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Can’t live without it. I tried a $22 eyeliner and it didn’t even compare to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This product did not function as a waterproof product for me it was easy to come off and went on very thick and clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Beth l

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this Rimmel product, will be looking at other Rimmel cosmetics. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Puliselic

product_meta.title: Rimmel Exaggerate Eye Definer, Blackest Black, 1 Count, Waterproof Long Lasting Easy Twist Up Self-Sharpening Eye Color Pencil
product_meta.description: Size:1 Count| Color:Blackest BlackWant the London look? Rimmel London brings you the Exaggerate Blackest Black Waterproof Eye Definer so you can live it up in style. This revolutionary eyeliner delivers an intense finish that is perfect for creating a smouldering and sexy eye look whether you're out for business or pleasure. Draw bold lines to highlight your eyes in just a single stroke. The formula is waterproof and colour-intense for a look that lasts. The Exaggerate Eye Definer is the perfect mainstay of any eyewear collection and a great gift for women who want to achieve the London look. Rimmel is the UK’s Number 1 makeup brand and the face of London style. We live for the riot of colour on the streets. For the vibrant clubs and the hidden bars. We devour the music and the energy and come back for more. Rimmel believes in fashion without rules and values every individual interpretation of beauty. Rimmel’s extensive range of hot looks and cool prices is kept bang up-to-date with new products and packaging launching all the time. Our products are creative and fashion-forward. Versatile and accessible. They are designed to encourage experimentation and self-expression. Live the London look.
feature_bullets: It's a high impact eyeliner pencil that includes a built-in smudger and sharpener
Intensely pigmented shades give a creamy matte to high metallic finish
High precision lines and subtle blending create strong and sexy eyes

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
